text: One problem with age is that patience begins to ebb.
author: Carl Hiaasen

text: My biggest weakness is patience, wanting to see things happen too quickly or get changes in place right away. Not having the patience to let things develop.
author: Paul Gleason

text: I haven't been given many things, but I've been given ample, limitless patience.
author: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

text: When you read about a car crash in which two or three youngsters are killed, do you pause to dwell on the amount of love and treasure and patience parents poured into bodies no longer suitable for open caskets?
author: Jim Bishop

text: Patience was not something that came naturally to me, but in cooking it is the quintessential skill.
author: Gail Simmons
